mapper.select: SELECT ID ,USERNAME ,NAME ,TYPE ,DATA ,USERNICK ,INSERT_TIME ,DELETE_TIME ,DELETE_YN ,UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_MYPAGE WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, TT.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_MYPAGE ORDER BY INSERT_TIME DESC) TT WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM <= (#{page}+1) * #{size} AND USERNAME = #{username} ) WHERE R > #{page} * #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MYPAGE WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND USERNAME = #{username}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MYPAGE WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MYPAGE SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' ,DELETE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE ID = #{id}
